about_the_game:
Embark on a galactic adventure in this thrilling space-mining simulator! Returning home from your interstellar travels, you stumble upon a mining station that presents the perfect opportunity to upgrade your outdated spaceship. Take on the role of a miner, harvest precious resources, and trade them for powerful upgrades.

Navigate asteroid fields, face increasingly challenging enemies, and master your spaceship’s controls in a vast, procedurally generated space environment. Customize your ship with four types of upgrades—cargo capacity, firepower, durability, and speed—each with multiple tiers to suit your playstyle.

With dynamic gameplay that combines resource management, strategic upgrades, and combat, the game offers a compelling progression system. Once fully upgraded, set off on your ultimate journey with your enhanced spacecraft, or start a new game to refine your mining skills.

Are you ready to conquer the stars and build the ship of your dreams? Adventure awaits!
